OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD BLUE COAT AND MOUNT PLEASANT EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides financial assistance for educational purposes to young people in financial need within a 20 mile radius of Sheffield Town Hall. Upper age limit 25 years. Holds two meetings a year in April and September.

ContactName.entry: Mr G J Smallman, Secretary/Mrs S Marshall, Charity Administrator

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-5pm, no personal callers, applications by telephone or letter
